content: i created this pattern for my tunisian mosaic crochet tutorial video you can watch that at https //youtu be/zzpvhewvz5k 1 this pattern is written just like all my other overlay mosaic crochet patterns but also includes a page to help teach you how to convert this and all my other mosaic crochet patterns into tunisian mosaic crochet **you can use this information to convert any of my mosaic crochet patterns into tunisian mosaic crochet ** ***important details*** us crochet terminology chart is 15 x 17 size without fringe or border 4 5 x 5 / 11 5cm x 13cm 5 mm hook h-8 worsted weight yarn 22 - 37 yards total o main color dark lines 10 yards o contrasting color background 12 yards o optional envelope border 15 yards gauge 14 stitches x 15 row = 4 ____ **techniques** this pattern is written up for overlay mosaic crochet and includes an x-marked chart you can follow the chart or written pattern there is video support and information in this pattern to help teach you how to convert from the overlay mosaic crochet technique to tunisian mosaic crochet i have youtube tutorials available for both crochet methods follow this link to get to my youtube channel and find my other social links https //ashleeslint com/link-in-bio 2 _____ ©️ ashlee brotzell 2025 all rights reserved this publication is protected under federal copyright laws reproduction or distribution in whole or in part in any medium is strictly prohibited what does this mean this is an original pattern by ashlee brotzell you may not copy reproduce sell or share any part of it whether for profit or not this includes but is not limited to the written pattern the chart and the photos no translations or video tutorials are allowed sales of your finished items are of course unrestricted and i wish you all the best i appreciate credit given to the designer when possible but it is not a requirement you may tag me @ashleeslint or direct people to my website www ashleeslint com 3 1 https //youtu be/zzpvhewvz5k 2 https //ashleeslint com/link-in-bio/ 3 https //ashleeslint com/
